button.error: Please enter a button text that is more than three characters long
button.info: Set the text on the booking invitation button. Your client will have to click it to make the appointment booking.
button.title: Button text of the booking invitation

color.info: Choose the accent color of your appointment form and calendar interface. For example, you can use your primary corporate color here.
color.title: Appointment calendar color

description.default: Dear customers, you are welcome to book an appointment now. Simply select a desired date and then fill out the form below.

name.error: Please enter a text that is more than three characters long
name.info: Enter a title for the calendar. This should state what type of appointment can be booked with the form. Ex: Individual consultation, photo shoot, trial training or similar.
name.title: Calendar title
